attributes.action: give sia security officers more powers of arrest and searching powers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: what is the point of the sia licence and training if it dont do much for you,if we could stop shoplifters and search them if we know they have something on them it would save the trouble of calling the police in to search when we can deal with it in store then if we need to call the police it will save time and money
